text: is a 2010 Japanese romance film directed by Hidetaka Itō who is known for the Fuji TV's variety show Run for Money Tōsōchū. Kazuma Sano and Mirei Kiritani play the lead roles. It was released on May 15, 2010. ==Cast== * Kazuma Sano as Aoi Kagami * Mirei Kiritani as Shion Mizuno * Yasuhisa Furuhara as Keita Hara * Rika Adachi as Karen Minami * Keisuke Kato as Tsubasa Momose * Naoko Tokuzawa ==References== ==External links== * Category:2010 films Category:2010s Japanese films Category:Japanese films Category:Japanese- language films Category:Japanese romance films Category:2010 romance films
title: Ongakubito
